cause.description:
We are an organization dedicated to help those who are in most need. We do not discriminate against anyone, and we do see sorrow in nem's eyes.
We do realize that it will be near impossible to get someone like this laid without breaking to many laws, so we are asking for a total of $14,000 CAD (the average asking price for a high-class hooker within Canada)
The reason why nem needs to get laid is simple, he just does. Popping his cherry will not only be a benifit to him, but to many others including the public and society. With his curiosity finaly being solved (loosing his virginity) nem will never have to go around *** ***ing all the people up the *** and down the *****. No more will people have to keep thier *****s shut closed, no more will people have to **** thier own ****ing ***** before stepping outside incase nem was watching. Not to mention, his wrists will never be in better shape after this transformation is complete. He will never have to wake up looking down at his **** wondering why its blue and purple after a nice long hand-to-self session, medicaly known as masturabation, also known as *** hurling your **** upside the length of the ****** while maintaining balance.
1. Whatevah! Ah do what ah want!
cause.name: Get Nem Laid
